mdRecord.dcterms:description: Slightly misspelled political slogan of comedian Love 22 who ran for governor in Rhode Island in 1982 (see here: https://www.upi.com/Archives/1982/06/07/And-By-The-Way-Prankster-Love-22-enters-gubernatorial-race/3471392270400/ ); with response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
